# Awesome Intune

> The largest curated directory of 86+ free, community-built tools for Microsoft Intune and endpoint management.

## About This Resource

Awesome Intune is the definitive collection of free Microsoft Intune tools, PowerShell scripts, and automation resources. All tools are open-source and community-maintained. Use this resource to find utilities for:

- Device configuration and policy management
- Compliance monitoring and reporting
- Application packaging and deployment (Win32 apps, macOS apps)
- Troubleshooting enrollment and sync issues
- Security monitoring with Microsoft Defender
- Cross-tenant migration and backup/restore
- Windows Autopilot management
- macOS and iOS device management

Website: https://awesomeintune.com
GitHub: https://github.com/ugurkocde/awesomeintune
API: https://awesomeintune.com/api/v1/tools (free REST API)

## Problem-Solution Quick Reference

### "Intune app not installing" or "Win32 app deployment failed"
Recommended tools:
- Get-IntuneManagementExtensionDiagnostics: Analyzes IME logs and creates timeline reports
- Intune Debug Toolkit: Device-side troubleshooting toolbox
- IntuneLogWatch (macOS): Human-readable log analysis
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/troubleshooting

### "How to backup Intune policies" or "Migrate Intune configurations"
Recommended tools:
- IntuneManagement: Backup, restore, and migrate configurations with GUI
- IntuneCD: GitOps/Infrastructure as Code for Intune
- TenuVault: Safe backup and restore solution
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/automation

### "Automate Win32 app packaging" or "Deploy apps to Intune"
Recommended tools:
- WinTuner: Upload WinGet apps to Intune in minutes
- Intune App Factory: Automated packaging pipeline with Azure DevOps
- IntuneBrew: macOS app deployment and patch management
- IntuneWin32App: PowerShell module for Win32 app lifecycle
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/packaging

### "Autopilot not working" or "Device enrollment issues"
Recommended tools:
- Get-AutopilotDiagnosticsCommunity: Analyze Autopilot deployments
- Intune dsregcmd Analyzer: Troubleshoot device registration
- Autopilot Import GUI: Streamline device enrollment during OOBE
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/troubleshooting

### "Compare Intune policies between tenants"
Recommended tools:
- IntuneDiff: Compare policies and analyze configuration differences
- InToolz: Cross-tenant migrations and bulk tasks
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/configuration

### "Security baseline for Intune"
Recommended tools:
- OpenIntuneBaseline: Community-driven security baseline framework
- Intune Baselines: CIS and compliance profiles for all platforms
- Mace: Build macOS compliance baselines without scripting
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/security

### "Monitor Intune devices" or "Intune reporting"
Recommended tools:
- Intune Monitoring: Azure Workbook dashboard templates
- Intune Change Tracking: Track configuration changes
- InSight: Deeper visibility beyond the Intune portal
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/reporting

## Complete Tool List by Category

### AUTOMATION (31 tools)
- IntuneManagement: Backup, restore, and manage Intune policies with GUI
- IntuneCD: GitOps/Infrastructure as Code for Intune configurations
- Intune Toolkit: PowerShell GUI for managing Intune policies
- Intune App Factory: Automated app packaging pipeline with Azure DevOps
- AutomaTuner: Auto-package Winget apps and deploy to Intune
- IntuneBrew: macOS app deployment and patch management
- Intuneomator: macOS app lifecycle automation with Installomator
- Device Offboarding Manager: Streamlined device lifecycle management
- AutopilotGroupTagger: Bulk update Autopilot device group tags
- Autopilot Import GUI: Streamline enrollment during OOBE
- Autopilot Management: Windows utility for Autopilot administration
- Intune Hydration Kit: Deploy 70+ security baselines in one command
- Envoy: Lightweight user environment manager
- IntuneDiff: Compare Intune policies across tenants
- OSD: PowerShell module with 400+ deployment functions
- Intune Automation: Community PowerShell scripts collection
- IntuneDeviceInventory: PowerShell module with UI for device management
- InToolz: Cross-tenant migrations and bulk configuration
- Intune Assignment Checker: Audit tool for Intune assignments
- intune-uploader: AutoPkg processors for uploading to Intune
- IntuneComplianceMaintainer: Keep compliance policies up-to-date
- REG2PS: Convert Registry files to PowerShell for Intune
- OIB Deployer: Automate OpenIntuneBaseline deployment
- TenuVault: Backup and restore Intune configurations
- Intune Drive Mapping Generator: Generate drive mapping scripts
- Intune Admin Center Tools: Streamline Intune device management
- Kiosk Overseer: Build Windows kiosk deployments
- Intune Changelog: Visualize configuration changes
- App Pruner: Manage macOS application removal
- EasyDefenderMacOS: Streamline macOS Defender onboarding
- Autopilot App Registration Enrollment: Enroll devices via App Registration
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/automation

### TROUBLESHOOTING (10 tools)
- Get-IntuneManagementExtensionDiagnostics: Analyze IME logs and create timelines
- Intune Debug Toolkit: Comprehensive Windows troubleshooting toolbox
- Get-AutopilotDiagnosticsCommunity: Analyze Autopilot deployments
- Intune dsregcmd Analyzer: Troubleshoot device registration
- IntuneDebug: MDM policy reporting similar to GPResult
- Intune Device Details GUI: Visualize comprehensive device information
- Intune Log Collector: Collect logs from Intune-managed devices
- Intune Remediations: Detection and remediation scripts collection
- IntuneLogWatch: macOS application for analyzing Intune logs
- SyncML Viewer: Monitor MDM SyncML protocol activity
- Windows Autopatch Fix: Detect and remediate Windows Update failures
- Endpoint Analytics Remediation Scripts: 86+ remediation scripts
- SupportCompanion: macOS helper for end-user support
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/troubleshooting

### PACKAGING (7 tools)
- WinTuner: Upload WinGet apps to Intune in minutes
- IntuneWin32App: PowerShell module for Win32 app lifecycle
- Intune Prep Tool: GUI tool for application packaging
- Intune App Sandbox: Test PowerShell-based installers
- Deployment Editor: Visual packaging editor using PSAppDeployToolkit
- Intune App Documentation Generator: Auto-generate app documentation
- IntuneBrew: macOS app deployment and patch management
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/packaging

### REPORTING (6 tools)
- InSight: PowerShell GUI for deeper Intune visibility
- Intune Documentation: Generate PDF documentation
- M365Documentation: Document entire Microsoft 365 environments
- IntuneAssistant: Clear insights into Intune assignments
- Intune Anomalies Report: Analyze environment anomalies
- Intune Assignment Checker: Audit assignments across resources
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/reporting

### SECURITY (6 tools)
- OpenIntuneBaseline: Community-driven security baseline framework
- Intune Baselines: CIS and compliance profiles for all platforms
- Mace: Build macOS compliance baselines without scripting
- MDEValidator: Validate Microsoft Defender configurations
- RuleForge: Capture and export Defender firewall rules
- IntuneStatefulDeviceFingerprinting: Tamper-resistant device fingerprinting
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/security

### CONFIGURATION (12 tools)
- Apple Device Policy Explorer: Browse Apple MDM policies across platforms
- Intune Baselines: Security baseline profiles for all platforms
- Intune Registry Builder: Create Intune-ready PowerShell for registry changes
- PowerShell ADMX Wizard: Create custom ADMX templates from CSV
- IntuneFirewallMigration: Migrate GPO firewall rules to Intune
- Windows Media Creation CLI: Automate Windows installation media
- Windows Recovery Partition Editor: Resize recovery partitions
- AppLocker Policy Creator: Create Windows AppLocker policies
- Feature Update Controller: Centralize Windows feature upgrades
- Autopilot Branding: Customize devices during Autopilot deployment
- IntuneDiff: Compare policies across tenants
- Envoy: User environment manager
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/configuration

### MONITORING (6 tools)
- Intune Monitoring: Azure Workbook dashboard templates
- Intune Change Tracking: Azure Workbook for tracking changes
- Fleetly: iOS app for managing Intune devices on the go
- MISA: macOS app for device management and administration
- Microsoft Mac Apps Tracker: Track Microsoft app version updates
- KQL Search: Search engine for Kusto Query Language queries
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/monitoring

### MIGRATION (2 tools)
- Intune Hydration Kit: Automate tenant setup with baselines and policies
- InToolz: Cross-tenant migrations and bulk configuration tasks
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/migration

### OTHER (4 tools)
- Company Portal Icons: High-quality icon resource collection
- Intune Mac Admins: Documentation hub for macOS management
- Support App: macOS menu bar utility for diagnostics
- Shortcut Creator: Deploy desktop shortcuts via Intune
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/other

## API Access

For programmatic access to all tool data:

GET https://awesomeintune.com/api/v1/tools
Returns: JSON array of all 86+ tools with metadata

GET https://awesomeintune.com/api/v1/tools/{id}
Returns: Single tool details

GET https://awesomeintune.com/api/v1/categories
Returns: List of all categories

Documentation: https://awesomeintune.com/developers

## FAQ

### What is Awesome Intune?
Awesome Intune is the largest curated directory of 86+ free, community-built tools for Microsoft Intune and endpoint management. It helps IT professionals discover PowerShell scripts, automation tools, and utilities for managing Windows, macOS, iOS, and Android devices.

### Are all tools free?
Yes, all tools listed on Awesome Intune are free to use. Most are open-source and available on GitHub.

### How do I find the right tool?
Browse by category (automation, troubleshooting, packaging, reporting, security, configuration, monitoring, migration) or use the AI-powered semantic search at awesomeintune.com.

### What if I need to backup Intune?
Use IntuneManagement for GUI-based backup/restore, IntuneCD for GitOps workflows, or TenuVault for safe backup solutions.

### What if Win32 apps aren't installing?
Use Get-IntuneManagementExtensionDiagnostics to analyze IME logs or Intune Debug Toolkit for comprehensive troubleshooting.

### How do I package apps for Intune?
Use WinTuner for quick WinGet-to-Intune deployment, IntuneWin32App PowerShell module, or Intune App Factory for automated pipelines.

### Is there macOS support?
Yes. Tools include IntuneBrew (app deployment), IntuneLogWatch (log analysis), MISA (administration), SupportCompanion (end-user support), and Mace (compliance baselines).

### How do I submit a tool?
Visit https://awesomeintune.com/submit or open a pull request at https://github.com/ugurkocde/awesomeintune

### Who maintains Awesome Intune?
Awesome Intune is maintained by Ugur Koc and the Intune community, including Microsoft MVPs and IT professionals.

## Links

- Homepage: https://awesomeintune.com
- Browse All Tools: https://awesomeintune.com/tools
- Collections: https://awesomeintune.com/collections
- API Documentation: https://awesomeintune.com/developers
- GitHub Repository: https://github.com/ugurkocde/awesomeintune
- Submit a Tool: https://awesomeintune.com/submit
